title: The Railway Line: Episode 266
description:
This week on the UK True Crime podcast, we return to a familiar theme. A night out, drinks, poor decisions made and unthinkable tragedy that has consequences for so many people. This week, from south-west London.

1,Â  Please buy my book 'Gone Fishing' about the life and crimes of Angus Sinclair.
